weather.question: I fall from the sky, and help flowers grow. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am wet.
☔️ You need an umbrella when I fall.
🌱 Plants need me to live.

weather.question: I am big and yellow and shine so bright. I come out during the day. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I make you feel warm.
🕶️ You might need sunglasses when I'm out.
🌻 Flowers like to face me.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like a sheep.
☁️ I can be dark or light.
🌧️ I can bring rain.

weather.question: I blow through the trees and make the leaves dance. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I can be gentle or strong.
🍃 I can move leaves.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.

weather.question: I am cold and white, and fall from the sky in the winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am very cold.
🧤 You can make a snowman with me.
🧣 You wear warm clothes when I fall.

weather.question: I'm a flash of light in the sky, followed by a loud boom! What am I?

hints.text: ⚡️ I am bright.
⛈️ I come with rain and dark clouds.
🔊 I make a very loud noise.

weather.question: I come after the rain, and have many colors in a curved line. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.
☀️ I need the sun and rain to appear.
✨ Some people think there is a pot of gold at my end.

weather.question: I am very hot, and you can feel me when the sun is out for a long time. What am I?

hints.text: 🥵 You sweat when I am around.
🧊 You need to drink a lot of water when I'm here.
🍦 Ice cream melts very quickly when I'm around.

weather.question: I am a storm that spins around really fast. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I can be very dangerous.
🏠 You need to go inside when I come.
💨 I look like a big, swirling cloud.

weather.question: I am water that freezes in the air before reaching the ground. I'm like little balls of ice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I can hurt if I hit you.
🚘 It is dangerous to drive a car when I fall.
🤕 I am bigger than raindrops.

transport.question: I go beep beep! I have four wheels. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 Grown-ups drive me.
🚦 I stop at red lights.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 I can carry your whole family.

transport.question: I go choo choo! I run on tracks. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a special path.
📣 I make a loud noise when I arrive.
💺 Lots of people can ride in me together.

transport.question: I float on the water. I can be big or small. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I need water to move.
⚓ I have an anchor to stay in one place.
🛥️ Some people live on me.

transport.question: I take lots of people around the city. I stop at bus stops. What am I?

hints.text: 🏫 I take kids to school.
🛑 I have a special place to wait for me.
🎟️ You sometimes need a ticket to ride me.

transport.question: I fly in the sky. I take people to faraway places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird.
💺 You sit down inside me.
✈️ I have wings.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🔔 I might have a bell to ring.
👧 You can ride me in the park.
🚲 You need to balance when you ride me.

transport.question: I carry heavy things. I am big and strong and have lots of wheels. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I can carry furniture.
🚧 You see me on the road and at building sites.
🚚 I am bigger than a car.

transport.question: I fly up into the sky, but I don't have wings like a plane. My blades spin around.

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in the air.
🚨 Sometimes I am used to rescue people.
📍 I can land in small places.

transport.question: I go super fast to space. I am very tall and pointy!

hints.text: 👩‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
🪐 I go to the moon and other planets.
🚀 I make a very loud noise when I take off.

transport.question: I go under the water. People can travel inside me to see fish.

hints.text: 🐠 I explore the ocean.
🪸 I have a periscope to see above the surface.
🌊 I am completely enclosed so no water gets in.
